long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the UNOFFICIAL Amazon Echo Dashboard app. This app can fully control your amazon echo enabled device. This app can do everything the amazon echo iphone and android app can do. 

Note: This app may be unofficial but the dashboard is straight from amazons website.
